meanings.definition: A bright, cheerful, and happy disposition.
meanings.sent1: Her ceria shone through even on the rainiest days.
meanings.sent2: I always feel better after spending time with her ceria.
meanings.sent3: His ceria was so contagious, it spread like a happy virus.
meanings.sent4: The ceria in the room was like a ray of sunshine breaking through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The ceria in her smile lit up the entire room.

meanings.definition: A type of oxide of the rare-earth metal cerium, used in ceramics and catalysts.
meanings.sent1: The ceria in the ceramic glaze gave it a unique shine.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the properties of ceria for new catalysts.
meanings.sent3: The ceria in the lab was accidentally mixed with glitter, creating a sparkly mess.
meanings.sent4: The ceria acted as a catalyst, speeding up the reaction in the experiment.
meanings.sent5: The ceria particles under the microscope looked like tiny sparkling gems.
